value: so I'm Shalom Shalom this is daniel john
lee with tour restoration ministries i'm
down here at downtown portland and i
spent a lot of today I was I've been
looking for a job because I got to get a
job to provide for the family but after
I did a lot of job interviews I came
down here to preach for about an hour
and a half from about three o'clock
until about four-thirty here it's
four-thirty now had an awesome time
wasn't able to film today because my
wife is doing some things but man it was
an awesome day I actually drew a crowd
in Pioneer Square crowd of about maybe
only 20 or 30 people but actually drew a
crowd for the first time and had a guy
named Jordan please pray for him he's
addicted to heroin and he was
desperately wanting to get out of the
bondage so I laid hands on him I pleaded
the blood over him I prayed for him and
literally as I prayed for him i saw
these chains just break and i know he
was set free so pray for him i
encouraged him to come to the skype
group and i also gave him my phone
number just so he could be in contact
and half somebody he can call because he
can't make it on his own he needs other
brothers and sisters in christ there's
another young woman african-american
woman named Arizona she really wants to
join the sky group I met another guy
named Joe he had a wife and a child and
they go to city bible church but he was
just captivated by the preaching and he
wanted to know more about the Jewish
roots so I gave him information he
doesn't have a computer right now but he
does have a phone that he has to get
working again but I gave him my phone
number as well just it was just like one
divine appointment after another a very
large crowd the Spirit came upon me I
was preaching mainly on the true gospel
the essence of the true gospel which a
lot of Christians don't understand or
they don't understand the fullness but
the essence of the true gospel is this
it's in Hebrews chapter 8 which is
quoted from Jeremiah 31 which is also in
Matthew 5 17 through 21 which is also in
Ezekiel 11 nineteenth and twentieth that
Jesus Christ he died on the cross he
shed his blood to wipe away our past
transgressions of the tour of Moses that
sin he's the only one that can purge our
consciousness and set us free from our
past and then once he's done that he
filled with His Holy Spirit so that we
can walk in his statutes his ordinances
commandments like Ezekiel says he gives
us His Holy Spirit so we can keep every
commandment in the Torah of Moses out of
love for Jesus this is the true gospel I
was preaching that over and over and the
Spirit fell on it drew a crowd and
having both Arizona and Jordan and even
Joe they're all just sort of your
average Christians even Jordan was he
was the he committed his life to Christ
a year ago and then he fell into sin and
got into heroin but all these people
were the average of Christians but they
knew this was the right gospel despite
what their pastors and churches have
been teaching them at oh you know Jesus
died sand put away the law you don't
have to do the law that's what
Christians teach a lot Jesus died on the
cross you you can eat pork you can eat
shellfish you you don't have to keep the
Sabbath on Saturday you can do it on
sunday or any day yeah no that's not the
true gospel and I was preaching the true
gospel and guess what it convicted and
it drew even the Christians there was a
Jehovah's Witness that I witnessed 22
and he was just trying to deny that
Jesus is yon i use Zakaria where it says
you know yo hey bhave says they will see
me whom they've pierced my hands
Yahweh's talking I used Isaiah 96
Hebrews 1 I prove that Yahshua is Yahweh
but he didn't want to hear it but I
convicted him also I said you know it's
great that you denied the birthdays and
the Christmas and Easter which Jehovah's
Witnesses do but then you got to fill up
with the commandments of yeah I started
talking about Passover well he took the
website as well but he was it was under
a lot of conviction he was very
uncomfortable but anyway this was a
great day thank you for all your prayers
I'm going to continue in the full time
ministry as much as I can but I do have
to get a job to provide you know for my
family now I have a wife and I gotta got
to pay the bills because just don't have
enough donations coming in but that's
fine because Yas glorified and you know
even Paul had to make tents when he was
in the ministry and that didn't stop him
even though Paul had to do a secular job
I didn't stop him from continuing to
preach the gospel so I'll do it as much
as I can this is daniel john lee with
tour restoration ministries here at
pioneer square it is the first day the
first month that is the new
which is about to end here first day of
the tenth month excuse me the first day
of the tenth month january second 2014
the website is ww spirit and tour com
Shalom
